query:
SELECT 
  nome,
  dum,
  dataUltrassom,
  igUltrassomSemanas,
  igUltrassomDias,
  -- C치lculo IG pela DUM
  FLOOR(DATEDIFF('2024-12-30', dum) / 7) as ig_dum_semanas,
  MOD(DATEDIFF('2024-12-30', dum), 7) as ig_dum_dias,
  -- C치lculo IG pelo US
  FLOOR((DATEDIFF('2024-12-30', dataUltrassom) + (igUltrassomSemanas * 7) + igUltrassomDias) / 7) as ig_us_semanas,
  MOD((DATEDIFF('2024-12-30', dataUltrassom) + (igUltrassomSemanas * 7) + igUltrassomDias), 7) as ig_us_dias,
  -- DPPs
  DATE_ADD(dum, INTERVAL 280 DAY) as dpp_dum,
  DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(dataUltrassom, INTERVAL (igUltrassomSemanas * 7 + igUltrassomDias) DAY), INTERVAL 280 DAY) as dpp_us
FROM gestantes 
WHERE nome = 'TESTE - Gestante Exemplo';

  -- DPPs
  DATE_ADD(dum, INTERVAL 280 DAY) as dpp_dum,
